description: From Old French mangonel, from Latin manganellus, manganum, from Ancient Greek μάγγανον (mánganon).

definitionGroups.group: (historical) A military engine formerly used for throwing stones and burning objects.

entries.meaning: A traction trebuchet (trebuchet operated by manpower).
(non-technical, often proscribed) An onager (type of catapult).
